alert.note: Alert for Larimer; Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 3:31PM MDT until August 05 at 4:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Weld County in northeastern Colorado... Southeastern Larimer County in north central Colorado... * Until 415 PM MDT. * At 331 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Masonville, or 7 miles southwest of Fort Collins, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Loveland around 340 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Berthoud, Johnstown, Milliken and Mead. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
